text.div:
Listeriosis (Tests for Listeria species in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    85763-1 Listeria monocytogenes DNA [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture
    88265-4 Listeria sp tuf gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    92767-3 Listeria sp DNA [Presence] by NAA with probe detection in Positive blood culture
    92780-6 Listeria monocytogenes DNA [Presence] by NAA with probe detection in Positive blood culture
